description: A large volcano has erupted spewing lava and soot onto vacationers!
The local Baboon tribe has caught wind of your food stores! Their theft has caused your party to kill and eat one member
The Cannibals are actually pretty chill guys. Everyone survives.
Plumbi rain down from the sky, killing 1.
Some heady bros show up and lay down some crunchy tunes. However, the vibe becomes severely harshed leaving one dead.
A naked, rabid, spear-wielding Gary Busey has emerged from the jungle and attacked

affectedPersons: Tensions are rising! An argument turned into a fight turned into murder

description: A coconut has fallen from a tree and killed someone. What luck!
During your boar hunt, the boar got the upper-hand
Went for a piss and never returned. Screams, followed by a deep gurgly noise were heard.
The island's mysterious, dark corporate entity has abducted one from your party! Suspected cause of death: chemical weapons testing
